game.title: The Lost Artifact
game.objective: Retrieve the lost artifact and return it to its rightful owner
game.description: Your mission is to infiltrate the enemy base, retrieve the stolen artifact, and return it to its rightful owner. Stealth and strategy are key in this quest.

task.description: You need to approach the enemy fort unseen. Use the surrounding wilderness as cover.
Once at the fort, find a way in without alerting the guards. Be aware of traps.
The artifact is most likely in the central tower. Retrieve it without any confrontations.
Return to Gandalf with the artifact.
